article:
Donald was not very good at maths. He could not understand the teacher's _ . Even when the teacher explained something again, Donald still could not understand it. "Never mind," Donald told himself. "I'm quite good at other _   . I cheat in the maths exam, then I won't be in  _ ."
"My deskmate Brian Smith is best at maths," he thought, "and I'll be able to  copy his answers."
The day of the exam came, and Donald sat behind Brian Smith, who always sat at the top of the _ . Donald carefully copied Brian's answers onto his own exam paper. At the end of the exam, the teacher _ the papers and graded them.
Then she said, "Well, boys and girls, I've decided to give a _ to the student who got the highest grade. It's _ for me to decide whom I will choose, however, because two students, Donald and Brian, got the _ grade."
"Let them share it." one of the _ said.
"I've thought about that," the teacher said, "but I've chosen Brian."
Donald was  _ when he heard this. He stood up and said, "That's not fair."
"That's _ ," the teacher said. "However, Brian's answer to Question 18 was 'I don't know.' Yours was ' _ do I.'"
